metadata.usage: Adaptive Poisson-Boltzmann Solver (APBS) is a software package for the numerical solution of the Poisson-Boltzmann equation (PBE), one of the most popular continuum models for describing electrostatic interactions between molecular solutes in salty, aqueous media. APBS v.1.3 Tutorial: http://www.nbcr.net/data/docs/wshelp/apbs
metadata.info: [options] apbs.in apbs.in is a formatted input file options: --output-file=Filename Enables output logging to the path listed in Filename. --help Display help information. --version Display the current APBS version.
